channel.title: Should I get a Wii?
channel.description:
Check this: http://www.lowestdeal.com/nintendoWII.html
Should I get it?

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

The only reason to get a console whatsoever is to be able to play Zelda and perhaps Mario. Most other games are shit. I would grab a NES or a SNES. You simply can’t find better gaming quality anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @victor_ZOLO victor_ZOLO
item.description:
@victor_ZOLO wrote:

wait for a year untill wii get more game, that what i did with ps2

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:13, topic:144178”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=197677.msg1763683#msg1763683 date=1190073713]
Why all here think about graphics?

The games is that most importain.
And price is also a thing.

[/quote]

Hmmm, lets see visual realism improves the game alot more than say a shitty little character with a large head and a crappy gamecube looking tennis racket. Then again Nintendo have never been about graphics, just cheap tacky shite.[/quote]

Never been about graphics? Resident evil 4 lags my ps2 like a bitch, yet runs smooth as you like on the gamecube, if it’s “lacking graphics”, why would the performance be better? Also, Resident Evil 5 may only be for Wii and PC, after the successful port of Resident Evil 4 to the Wii, which I might add, looks a hell of a lot better than other wii games.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I have a 360 and a Wii.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Dont get a PS3 or XBOX or anything else for that matter…

Toyko Game show is coming up the day after Halo, there is going to be some BIG announcements from all sides…

Rumors of PS3 Price drop on Halo day, and rumble coming back…

And for me, I <3 my Wii.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Hm. If you could ‘rent a Wii’, then sure, go ahead and rent it. However, the Wii will be used for about a month or so. Soon, you will find another novelty and start playing with that. A Wii really isn’t worth it in the long term…

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

goatee:

PS2 had the worst graphics? I’m pretty sure it was better than the xbox and the gamecube hardly existed in that gen.

I’m pretty sure Xbox was on top.

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:16, topic:144178”][quote author=goatee link=topic=197677.msg1763700#msg1763700 date=1190074031]

Hmmm, lets see visual realism improves the game alot more than say a shitty little character with a large head and a crappy gamecube looking tennis racket. Then again Nintendo have never been about graphics, just cheap tacky shite.
[/quote]
Never say never.
Look at PS2 had that best graphics in that gen?
No it has worse, but that came many good games to it.
Yes bad graphic can destory a game, but if you want good graphic go out in real life, there all look like real.[/quote]

PS2 had the worst graphics? I’m pretty sure it was better than the xbox and the gamecube hardly existed in that gen.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I bought a Wii for $250 from Best Buy a few months ago, it is the first game system I actually purchased since the venerable N64. The reason I bought a Wii is because of the innovative control system, and I am happy I bought it. PS3’s are not worth the money, and Xbox 360 games you can get (ie download for free) for computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Wiis are alright, i just cant stand the crappy control thing on golf i mean it’s nothing like the advert it’s crap. And the graphics rape my eyes like pedobear. Get a PS3 if you want top of the range with a few good games or Xbox 360 if you want alright console with some crazy good games.

Personally I have PS3 and 360 but the only way I would get a wii is if it was free. I’ll definitely be getting the poo.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:

ThugLife:

Ps3 has that axis things on its controllers, meaning you can move them around and get a bit of interaction from the games, but i don’t think many games supported the feature and of course its not as ‘physical’ as the wii

it works whit “motorstorm”

item.title: Should I get a Wii?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

lordbost:

Get ps3

^^

Wii’s are crap imo.
If you can’t afford a ps3 then get an xbox 360 they are very close in performance and crap, though i choose ps3 over xbox.

Ps: Don’t go e-rape me for not choosing an xbox, its just an opinion.
